transcript:
Customer: Yes ma'am.
Executive: Uh, can I get your name?
Customer: Yeah, Deepika.
Executive: Deepika, from where you are contacting right now?
Customer: Noida head office.
Executive: Noida. Okay, Deepika, try to explain to someone that our owner is asking for a field visit. So we can't, we are just staff over here. We can't say directly like this, right? So if a concern comes, you have to rectify that. You you says that everything through calls it's you are rectifying but directly visiting a place and explaining them regarding the process.
Customer: No problem, servicing will come to you, trust me. You can just be sure.
Executive: That's what, directly coming and visiting a showroom and explaining all the details, it's different. Through call, it's different.
So try to explain to your manager or whoever, they are asking for a field visit.
Customer: Can I speak to your owner, ma'am, for once?
Executive: She is not, she is not here. She is in, she is being, she is out of station. So only she is asking us to attend their calls or the Google Meet, everything. But she is asking to come directly.
Customer: Can you provide her number?
Executive: We can't directly provide. You can, you can, you can check to someone and ask them to give a solution for this.
Customer: Okay, okay, then, uh, um, you please convey this message also to her that it is not.
Executive: I have already informed. I already, no, no, I have already informed. She is asking this. She is asking to rectify that and ask a person to come for a field visit. It is M in or someone else also, it is not an issue. We want someone to come for a field visit.
Customer: Still once, uh, I am just, uh
Executive: I have asked and I have spoken to her, uh, two, three times. She is asking this same thing.
Customer: Ma'am, I'll get back to you, right? Because, uh, as I said that it is, uh, not in our hand and it is not possible also. And if you have any, your
Executive: Hello, Deepika, can you, uh, give me someone's number from Cochin office so I can speak to them? That's better, I think so.
Customer: No, but your account is assigned to us, right? So we have to, uh, service you. That is the reason. But that's what.
Executive: Ha, say, try to rectify this because we want a person who can come directly and explain us each and everything. We won't be able to check through calls every time, right? So it's better directly if we can have a word with face to face, it will easily understandable.
Customer: It is not possible. Field visit is not possible.
Executive: If you say like this that you have to rectify something, you have to give some solution, right?
Customer: The new solution is just that that I provide you better service, right?
Executive: That's what. It's not, it's okay. It's you are saying that it's Google Meet through Google Meet or through calls everything can be rectified. But whatever our owners are saying, that only we can say.
Customer: But you understand. We are also staff. We can't say no to everyone, right? So we have to get a solution.
Executive: You please arrange a call back from her or you please tell me at what time should I call tomorrow also I can call. You please share me.
Executive: Whatever our owners are saying only we can say to you. If you want, uh, to speak to someone else, it's okay. I can speak to whoever you want. But we, that's what our owner is saying only I can say you. They are asking for a field visit, that's it.
Customer: Uh, but, uh, the thing is that it is not possible, ma'am. Still, I would like to speak to your, uh, owner also. Okay, can I
Executive: I will just check. Uh, can you give me a call back by tomorrow 10:00 or 11:00? I will ask to her what to say. So I can inform you guys.
Customer: Uh, sure, sure. I'll give you tomorrow, okay?
Executive: Okay, give me a call back by tomorrow 11:30. So I can ask her by morning and give you the answer. Okay, I can't say it from my end.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Okay, okay, thank you, bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a field visit for explanation.

- Unable to get resolution through calls.

- Wants to speak to the owner.



Resolution:

- Executive unable to arrange field visit.

- Executive will check with owner and revert.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back tomorrow at 11:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, owner, resolution
